conversations.body_text: Hi Kristian Jorgensen,       I apologize for not responding to you promptly. I see your package has been delivered. Have you received it?

Hi
Yes I have received the package. Thanks.
BR. Kristian

Den 15. jan. 2026 kl. 08.56 skrev service@simsonn.com:

﻿
Hi Kristian Jorgensen,

[X]
I apologize for not responding to you promptly. I see your package has been delivered. Have you received it?
Hi Kristian Jorgensen,  You're welcome. Thank you for purchasing our product. Should you have any questions in the future, please feel free to contact us. We will address them promptly.

Thank you very much.
Vh. Kristian

Den 16. jan. 2026 kl. 04.01 skrev service@simsonn.com:

﻿
Hi Kristian Jorgensen,

You're welcome. Thank you for purchasing our product. Should you have any questions in the future, please feel free to contact us. We will address them promptly.
